author: Special Correspondent
text:
Farmers belonging to various organisations and forums on Sunday took out a protest rally here, demanding action against the private finance company for the suicide of a farmer of Orathur.

The deceased Alagar was said to have committed suicide on Friday after his tractor was seized by a private company for failing to repay the loan.

Holding the private company responsible for the suicide of Alagar, the farmers took out a rally that went along the important roads in the town.

Petition

They then presented a petition to the Superintendent of Police A.K. Giri demanding action against the company.

N. Selladurai, district secretary, Tamil Nadu Vyvasayigal Sangam of Ariyalur and Perambalur said that action must be taken against the private company. Moreover, the family of Alagar must be given compensation of Rs.10 lakh in addition to the government job for the wife of Alagar.
title: Farmers take out protest rally
